overview: When Jade Nile arrives home from college, after growing up through all her college experiences, she finds her step-mom Jaclyn exactly how she left her. Jade's intense nostalgia for her bedroom calls to her. In high school, this was her refuge, and what teen doesn't use masturbation to escape the day to day. Jade's stepmom Jaclyn knows exactly what to do to welcome her back into the house, and preps her a delicious sandwich. Little does Jaclyn know that Jade will use her horniness to convince her that sex is the best way to get close again. But will it end there? Jade's around for a few more days. Ariella Ferrera preps an especially sweet treat for Maddy's favorite day of the year, but pie isn't all that Ariella has planned for Maddy. Lisa and Savannah assert themselves to their teens, showing perfectly that they are the head of the house.
title: Mommy Caught Me
